name: Turn any RSS feed into email
description:
Use case
This workflow automatically turns any RSS feed into a newsletter. It send an email every time a new post is published to an RSS feed in the last hour. 
I have been using this personally to follow Derek Sivers and Anil Dash, who don't have newsletters. Check them out ðŸ˜‰

How to setup
Add your email and email creds
Add the RSS feed URLs you want to follow

How to adjust this template
Add the feeds you want to follow. It does not have to be just email. Why not get a telegram message? Or Slack message? Ah the power of n8n ðŸš€
